lexUnit.name: marry.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: take as one's wife or husband in marriage.

sentence.text: A music hall singing star , Rose Trelawny , tries to marry above her station but she is miserable -- a bird in a golden cage .
Your mother was a silly greedy girl -- a gold-digger who wanted to marry above her station , but took fright at the last moment , without caring what hurt she bestowed .
